bio: has tried various things about crypto,trader, defi analisis, and now is focusing on building projects and running node operators in various chains.
contributionDescription:
I want to build a personal website application based on web3 blockchain and I prefer optimism because it is faster and cheaper.

Building a project like this with only my own capital without a team is quite difficult, but I will try, so I need funds to start all this.

and this is the reason I joined the RetroPGF Round 3 program, hopefully I will succeed

contributionLinks.description: contract to apply to register for a personal website using referrals

impactDescription:
I can't give you an idea of the impact yet, because this is a very new project in ecosystem optimism. 

I simply created a web3 that is useful for creating personal applications for yourself with the help of blockchain optimism,

so people register without having to give their email or password just by connecting their wallet.

fundingSources.description: I used my personal funds to make this project, and spent approximately $5000.

pwFlaggedReason: The application should be flagged for promising future impact, which violates rule 1 of the grant program's rules. The applicant details a project that they want to undertake in the future, rather than detailing any past contributions or impacts made.
